verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Somebody's knockin' at your door,
Somebody's knockin' at your door,
O sinner, why don't you answer?
Somebody's knockin' at your door.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Knocks like Jesus,
Somebody's knockin' at your door;
Knocks like Jesus,
Somebody's knockin' at your door.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
O sinner, why don't you answer?
Somebody's knockin' at your door.
